Title: Delver's Call: The Sinkhole
Description:
We have reports of large amounts of kobyss gathering towards a lair called the Sinkhole. There are concerns they plan to attack the smaller coast villages when they get the chance.

There's a hefty reward for anyone who can go into the Sinkhole and stop whatever they're planning!
ObjectivesText: Complete the Sinkhole delve on any difficulty.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Aegor Irynbawnd in Lorel's Crossing.
CompletionText: Beware of what lurks within the Sinkhole.
RewardText:
Thank you for the aid. It's hard to aid everyone in Hallowfall given the current situation.

Hopefully, the kobyss will think twice about trying any further attacks.

Objectives.Text: The Sinkhole delve completed on any difficulty
